entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
